subject: missing part
description_text:
Good afternoon,
I'm mailing to ask about a part that i am missing for my simsonn Vibration
Auxillery Motor.
i recently ordered the simsonn pro x ultra pedals with the 3 pack VAM. i
received both packages last week and i am missing the mount for the clutch
motor. is there any way i can have one sent to my address?
The order number is #SSN3743

thanks in advance,
Robin Dijt

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8292 中
